Description:
Notice Serial Number:  020921/RH01  311967898
As an employer you have failed to undertake a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks to the health and safety of your employees to which they are exposed whilst they are at work when loading and unloading roof trusses

Notice Serial Number:  020921/RH03   311967992
As employer you have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely wood dust, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Notice Serial Number:  291021/RH01  311992405
As employer you have failed to ensure that the risk to employees from exposure to noise, is either eliminated at source, or where this is not reasonably practicable, reduced to as low a level as is reasonably practicable
